text: 27.51: Kis 26.31-33 naŋga, 2 Sto 3.14 naŋga, Mk 15.38 naŋga, Lu 23.45 naŋga, Hi 6.19 naŋga, 10.19-20Kamatɨhi kandɨhɨrɨvɨ hañɨndaya mɨkwɨrɨ aru, Gotɨŋ kɨrañɨŋguhu tavɨyɨ inanandɨta kɨrasɨmi haŋandɨhin, kɨmba hambu kɨta sɨhɨrata mɨŋguta aŋgamɨŋga hambu yɨvurahami. Kamata arɨkinzɨŋga yɨvurahami. Kamatɨhi pɨrɨ nɨ namanama tɨhi, tɨmba aruru haŋɨnɨŋ pɨhumbɨramu.
